channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says 'great times' are ahead for U.S.
item.description: President Trump said Americans should've expected the chaos that has come from his tariffs and the upheaval of the economy.

item.title: Reading Scores Plummet In Rich Blue States And Rise In Poor Red Ones
item.description: The reading and math scores of students in Mississippi and Louisiana have surpassed those in deeply Democratic states such as California.

item.title: 50 Years After Vietnam, Our Troops Remain Demoralized By Defeat
item.description: We would do well to consider how our choices in Vietnam affected our military and society in ways still felt today.

item.title: Kamala Harris plans to take on Trump in first major speech since leaving office — but it'll cost you to watch
item.description: Emerge, a training organization that seeks to prepare Democratic women to run for office, is charging $25 for viewers to gain access to the virtual li...

item.title: Grading Trump’s First 100 Days
item.description: There’s much to like in Trump’s start, but much more to dread.

item.title: Cruz escalates feud with ex-Iranian official working at Princeton: ‘You should be deported’
item.description: Sen. Ted Cruz said in comments on X that Princeton faculty Seyed Hossein Mousavian should be deported.

item.title: The government introduces a new policy for terminating international students' legal status
item.description: The U.S. government has begun shedding new light on a crackdown on international students, spelling out how it targeted thousands of people and laying...

item.title: Michigan Law Would Let You Register To Vote Unless You Prove You’re Not A Citizen
item.description: 'Michigan elections are already [in] shambles. Now, HB 4983 will turn our elections into the wild west,' said state Rep. Rachelle Smit.

item.title: New Trump-linked consulting firm launches in DC to navigate crypto, AI : 'Trust, connected voice'
item.description: A new government relations firm with past ties to the Trump administration has launched in Washington, D.C., to advocate for clients in crypto and AI.

item.title: The IMF Has a Poor Forecasting Record
item.description: The IMF would do us a great service if it stopped pretending that it can accurately forecast the world economic outlook.

item.title: Child care in the Capitol: As more mothers run for office, some are bringing their kids
item.description: When Florida state Rep. Fiona McFarland's infant daughter, Grace Melton, crawled for the first time, the mom of four was right next door, hard at work...

item.title: Decline Of Christianity Sparks Rise In Claims For Religious Protections Of Psychedelics
item.description: Well-funded and led by scholars, lawyers, religious leaders, and entrepreneurs, the goal is to obtain U.S. legalization of psychedelics.

item.title: U.S. economy contracted in first quarter, fueling recession concerns
item.description: The U.S. economy shrank in the first quarter of the year, a sign that President Trump's tariffs are starting to impact businesses.

item.title: Uzbekistan agrees to pay for and accept 131 Central Asian illegal immigrants in landmark agreement
item.description: The Trump administration struck a deal to deport over 100 illegal immigrants from Central Asia to Uzbekistan at no cost to the U.S., setting a new mod...

item.title: George Clooney’s Broadway Coup
item.description: The sanctimonious proto-Communist bait of Good Night, and Good Luck .

item.title: Trump to name Haitian gangs foreign terrorist organizations: report
item.description: The Trump administration reportedly told Congress it will designate the Haitian gangs Viv Ansanm and Gran Grif as foreign terrorist organizations.

item.title: Trump says he 'could' get Kilmar Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador prison
item.description: President Trump said he could get Kilmar Abrego Garcia back from a Salvadoran prison if he were a "gentleman."

item.title: RFK Jr. Gets One Right
item.description: He’s correct in questioning the Covid-19 vaccine’s inclusion on the schedule for children.

item.title: Poll: Democrats’ Empathy Schtick Isn’t Fooling Voters Anymore
item.description: For the first time in 30 years, Democrats and Republicans are tied 33 percent to 33 percent on the question of who 'cares more for the needs of people...

item.title: The Path to Greater Peace in the Middle East Is Clear
item.description: President Trump’s return to the White House has created a once-in-a-generation opportunity to deepen and expand the circle of peace and cooperation.
